full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHE JANG JONG WANG GI DGE BSGOS CAS SANG NANG SO CHOS 'PHEL BYA BAS, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I MDZAD PA BZLOG BSGYUR SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS CUNG RGYAS PA ZHIG BGYIS ZHES BSKUL BA LA NGO MA LTOG PAR, ,DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL 'BYNUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BGYIS @010A *, ,BA'I NYE TSOGS KUN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BYAMS SHING BZONG PAR GSOL, ,'ON KYANG GANG BGYIS PA KUN LA PHAN DANG BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
